channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Nvidia Wants To Be Your Open Source Model Provider
item.description: AI infrastructure dominance isn't enough. Nvidia wants in on the model world too.

item.title: Get 22 Percent Off One of Our (and Taylor Swift's) Favorite Pillows
item.description: Eagle-eyed Swifties have ID’d the star’s pillow brand in a recent TV show appearance, and it’s one of my favorites as well. Coop is having a special sale to commemorate the event.

item.title: Read Dead Redemption 2 gratuit le 31 décembre : la liste des jeux Epic Games offerts en fuite et donne bien envie
item.description: L’Epic Games Store prépare un nouveau coup d’éclat pour la fin d’année. Après avoir offert Hogwarts Legacy dès le 11 décembre, une fuite relayée sur les réseaux chinois laisse entrevoir une impressionnante liste de seize titres supplémentaires, parmi lesquels Red Dead Redemption 2 ou Detroit : Become Human.

item.title: Dreaming of a White Christmas? Don’t Hold Your Breath
item.description: After a very cold and snowy start to December, temperatures will shift toward unseasonable warmth just in time for Christmas.

item.title: There's still time — here are 25 gift ideas from Walmart that arrive before Christmas
item.description: I've hand-picked my favorite last-minute gifts at Walmart that arrive before Christmas, featuring deals from Apple, Dyson, Keurig, and more.

item.title: Test du Framework Desktop : ne le commandez pas avant d’avoir lu ça
item.description: Framework nous a habitués à un dogme quasi-religieux : tout doit être démontable, tout doit être remplaçable. Et pourtant, en ouvrant ce "Desktop", on tombe sur une hérésie : 128 Go de mémoire soudée à la carte mère, inamovible pour l'éternité. Est-ce que Framework a vendu son âme au diable ? Pas vraiment, on vous explique pourquoi.

item.title: « On est très confiants » : comment Volkswagen compte sur la Chine et sa voiture électrique à 25 000 € pour se sortir de l’impasse
item.description: Après des années d'investissements dans l'électrique, Volkswagen va enfin commencer à récolter les fruits de son investissement. La marque allemande a dépassé Tesla sur le marché européen des véhicules 100 % électriques et prépare une offensive avec l'arrivée de l'ID.Polo à 25 000 euros.

item.title: Tesla robotaxis spotted on public roads without safety monitors
item.description: After years of false promises and missed deadlines, several Tesla vehicles have been spotted over the weekend driving autonomously without safety monitors on public roads in Austin. For months, Tesla's robotaxis in Austin and San Francisco have included safety monitors with access to a kill switch in case of emergency - a fallback that Waymo […]

item.title: Les astronomes stupéfaits : un trou noir a transformé une étoile en arme cosmique
item.description: L’histoire ressemble à de la science-fiction. Pourtant, c’est bien ce que des astronomes ont observé dans l'Univers. Un trou noir supermassif qui se sert des restes d’une étoile qu’il a déchiquetée pour en frapper une autre.

item.title: Fallout season 2 is streaming one day early
item.description: The second season of Fallout is debuting one day earlier than previously announced: the new season will now launch on Tuesday, December 16th at 9PM ET / 6PM PT on Prime Video, Amazon says. The season will have eight episodes that will premiere weekly on Wednesdays (besides this first episode), with the season finale airing […]

item.title: What is the release date for The Mighty Nein episode 7 on Prime Video?
item.description: Here's when The Mighty Nein episode 7 will be released on Amazon's streaming platform.

item.title: 5 of the best free movies to stream on Tubi, Pluto TV, Samsung TV Plus, and more this week (December 15)
item.description: From epic biographical comedies to underrated dramas, there’s plenty to watch on the best free streaming services this week.

item.title: Voici le meilleur téléviseur LCD Mini-LED de l’année – Frandroid Awards 2025
item.description: Le meilleur téléviseur LCD Mini-LED testé par Frandroid est le Soyn Bravia 9. Découvrez pourquoi ce produit a reçu le Frandroid Awards avec Delos de sa catégorie.

item.title: Zoom brings its AI assistant to the web with access to free users
item.description: Zoom is allowing free users to try its AI assistant in limited capacity

item.title: Fortnite Winterfest 2025 start date — here's what we know about this year's Christmas event
item.description: Here's when Fortnite Winterfest 2025 starts, and what we know about the Christmas skins and cosmetics so far. More on the teaser released this week.

item.title: Avant-goût des Frandroid Awards 2025 et 3 Matinales : ne loupez pas notre programme Twitch de la semaine
item.description: Notre programme Twitch de la semaine du 15 décembre, c’est juste ici : nous vous donnons rendez-vous mardi, mercredi, jeudi et vendredi sur notre chaîne Frandroidlive, autant pour siroter votre café devant notre Matinale Tech' que pour profiter d'une édition spéciale Frandroid Awards 2025.

item.title: Samsung 48S90F : ce TV 4K OLED 144 Hz compact est 400 € moins cher à l’approche de Noël
item.description: Officialisé en 2025, le TV Samsung TQ48S90F est un modèle OLED haut de gamme qui devrait ravir aussi bien les cinéphiles que les gamers exigeants. Actuellement, Son-Vidéo le propose à 801 euros au lieu de 1 190 euros.

item.title: Why You Should Remember the Roomba, Even After iRobot Is Kaput
item.description: While iRobot is selling itself off as scrap, let's remember what actually makes a good robovac.

item.title: 'Banning VPNs for kids is the dumbest possible fix' – Windscribe CEO
item.description: While age verification for VPN apps would set a 'terrible precedent'

item.title: #FrandroidOffreMoi un écran gaming ultra fluide TCL QD-Mini LED
item.description: Le calendrier de l'Avent #FrandroidOffreMoi continue de vous gâter ! Aujourd'hui, nous nous adressons tout particulièrement aux joueurs compétitifs avec un écran taillé pour la performance et la vitesse : le TCL 24G645 QD-Mini LED.

item.title: How Michele Singer Reiner, Rob Reiner’s wife, changed rom-com movies forever
item.description: The couple, whose tragic death has left Hollywood shocked, met during the production of “When Harry Met Sally.” The meeting would prove consequential. Since the tragic news broke that director Rob Reiner and his wife, Michele Singer Reiner, have died, tributes have been pouring in.

item.title: High-Tech ‘Bubble Wrap’ Lets You Hold Fire Without Getting Burned
item.description: Once applied to building windows, the thin insulator could save houses a lot of energy in the future.

item.title: Comment vos mots de passe, même sécurisés, en disent beaucoup sur vous [Sponso]
item.description: Est-ce que vous vous souvenez comment vous avez créé vos mots de passe ? Sur quelles bases conscientes ou inconscientes l'avez-vous façonné ? On vous explique ce qu'un mot de passe dit de vous, et les implications en matière de protection de la vie privée que cela comporte.

item.title: In 2025, tech giants decided smart glasses are the next big thing
item.description: There's a growing sentiment that gadgets have gotten boring. And while I don't fully agree, I understand why people might feel that way. Just think about some of the novel device types that companies have tried to push since the original iPhone came out. 3D TVs were a massive flop and tablets still feel like extra-large smartphones despite Apple's efforts to prop them up as laptop replacements. Meanwhile, even with huge technological advancements over the last decade, VR headsets remain relatively niche due to factors like high prices and a lack of compelling content. And although big names li...

item.title: Netflix responds to concerns about WBD deal
item.description: Industry concerns over Netflix acquiring Warner Bros has led executives to address fears regarding jobs and theatrical releases.

item.title: Facebook Messenger’s desktop app is no more
item.description: The app remains usable via the web, Facebook app, and through the mobile app for iOS and Android.

item.title: Vous nous avez alertés, Free a-t-il menti sur le tarif bloqué de la Freebox Pop S ?
item.description: Un lecteur nous informe que la Freebox Pop S aurait vu son prix augmenter, rompant avec la promesse de Free de maintenir un prix pendant 5 ans.

item.title: Google Maps dans Gemini ne fonctionne plus comme avant
item.description: Chercher un restaurant, un café ou un lieu dans Gemini ne donne plus du tout la même réponse.

item.title: Apple says it fixed zero-day flaws used for 'sophisticated' attacks
item.description: Two bugs in WebKit apparently abused in highly sophisticated attackshave been fixed.

item.title: Kevin Hassett, the top pick to replace Fed chair Powell, reveals how he’d handle Trump
item.description: In an interview on ‘Face the Nation,’ Kevin Hassett said Trump’s opinions on interest rates would not having any bearing on the Fed. A leading candidate to be President Donald Trump’s choice for Federal Reserve chair said that he would present the president’s views to Fed officials for their consideration but they could reject them if they chose when making decisions on interest rates.Kevin Hassett, in an interview Sunday on CBS News’ “Face the Nation,” said he would continue to speak with Trump if he becomes the Fed chair. But when asked if Trump’s opinions on interest rates would have “equal...

item.title: GNOME bans AI-generated extensions
item.description: Earlier this month, the GNOME Shell Extensions store updated its review guidelines to include a new section specifically stating that "extensions must not be AI-generated," as reported by It's FOSS and Phoronix. Developers producing add-ons for the Linux desktop environment can still use AI as a tool, but if their extension's code contains signs of […]...

item.title: Enceintes sono 2025 : la sélection des meilleures enceintes de soirées
item.description: Pour écouter votre musique à fond au bord de la piscine ou même organiser un karaoké en extérieur, le tout sans se prendre la tête, l'enceinte de soirée est l'appareil idéal. Nous avons sélectionné pour vous les meilleures enceintes sono Bluetooth de soirée.

item.title: iOS 26 bug is turning Android photos red in iPhone camera app
item.description: Photos taken on Android phones are appearing with a haunting red filter over them in the iPhone Photos app.

item.title: New Clue Emerges From Botched Scandinavian Raid: A 2,300-Year-Old Fingerprint
item.description: In the fourth century BCE, mysterious raiders attacked a Danish island. Now we might finally know where they came from.

item.title: Apple, Google will be asked to block nude images until age is verified in the UK, report reveals
item.description: The UK government plans to ask tech giants to block nude images without age verification.

item.title: Merriam-Webster’s 2025 word of the year is ‘slop’
item.description: Merriam-Webster has settled on a word that represents 2025 - and that word is "slop." The dictionary-maker defines "slop" as "digital content of low quality that is produced usually in quantity by means of artificial intelligence," something that many people have become familiar with as AI-generated content permeates the internet. This year, some of the […]...

item.title: The Meta Quest 3S is $50 off and is bundled with a $50 gift card and game
item.description: If you’re looking for a last-minute gift for a gamer, you’re in luck. Both Best Buy and Target are offering the 128GB Meta Quest 3S VR headset for around $249 ($50 off) and include a $50 gift card on top of that. Best Buy has bundled the headset with a copy of The Walking Dead: […]

item.title: The 8 Biggest Takeaways From That Gruesome, Euphoric ‘It: Welcome to Derry’ Finale
item.description: Pennywise was always going to slither away for another 27-year slumber, but boy did he wave good-bye with gusto.

item.title: The 11 best gifts under $25 for 2025
item.description: So you want to give someone a gift but you don’t have a ton of cash to spare. Don’t fret because first, you’re not alone, and second, there are tons of options to choose from. Especially if you’re looking in the tech space, it can feel especially daunting to find a gadget that’s affordable but also worth gifting — in other words, not a piece of junk that will eventually take up residence at the bottom of a drawer. But you don’t have to drain your wallet to get someone a cool gadget that will both be useful and make their lives easier. We’ve collected our favorite pieces of tech under $25 that ...

item.title: This literal lava lamp looks nothing like your lamp from the ’70s
item.description: Hint: It’s made from actual lava. If you grew up pre-Y2K, chances are you’re familiar with the concept of a lava lamp. It’s much less likely that you’ve ever encountered a lamp made out of literal lava.

item.title: Meet ‘Fuzozo,’ the AI emotional companion debuting at CES 2026
item.description: Fuzozo — a fluffy, purring AI companion that recognizes you, follows you, and feels emotionally alive — is launching at CES 2026.

item.title: Kindle a trouvé la meilleure idée pour se rappeler de tous les personnages de Game of Thrones
item.description: Amazon poursuit son virage vers l’intelligence artificielle. Après Prime Video, c’est au tour de l’application Kindle d’adopter les modèles de langage. Sa nouvelle fonctionnalité, « Ask this book », permet aux lecteurs de dialoguer directement avec leurs ouvrages numériques pour poser des questions sur l’intrigue ou les personnages, sans risquer de spoilers. Déjà testée sur iOS aux États‑Unis, elle annonce une nouvelle ère interactive pour la lecture, non sans soulever quelques enjeux de confidentialité et de droits d’auteur....

item.title: Denmark wants to ban VPNs to unlock foreign, illegal streams – and experts are worried
item.description: Denmark has drafted a new law to stop people from using VPNs to access foreign streaming libraries and illegal websites. But digital rights advocates are sounding the alarm.

item.title: Les 10 smartphones les plus populaires de la semaine sur Frandroid : OnePlus, Nothing, Samsung et Xiaomi mettent Android à l’honneur
item.description: Pour notre top 10 des smartphones les plus populaires de la semaine sur Frandroid, certaines marques prennent le dessus. Au programme de ce top, plusieurs constructeurs de smartphones Android avec leurs visions de téléphones.

item.title: Swallowing the Moon and other new indie games worth checking out
item.description: Welcome to our latest roundup of what's going on in the indie game space. Between The Game Awards and showcases like Day of the Devs, Wholesome Snack, Latin American Games and Women-Led Games, there’s been a ton of video game news over the last week (I need Control Resonant ASAP, please and thank you, Remedy). And hey, guess what? I've got even more for you to dig into, including info on some new releases that you can play right now.One of those is a game I’d been looking forward to since about 2022, and it’s always nice when something you’ve remained patient for turns out to be worth the wait...

item.title: Spotify was down this morning for thousands of users: Updates on the widespread outages
item.description: My boyfriend texted me those dreaded four words: "Is your Spotify down?" Sure enough his, mine and thousands of other users' Spotify accounts appear to be down and out at the moment, with Downdetector recording over 10,000 reports from users. Spotify is apparently working on the problem. The account, Spotify Status, shared an update on X at 9:45 AM on Monday, "We’re aware of some issues right now and are checking them out!" About an hour later, the company shared an update saying that the outage was resolved as of 10:34 AM ET. All clear! Thanks for your patience. If you're still having issues,...

item.title: The excellent Sony WH-1000XM6 headphones are back at their Black Friday price
item.description: Score the Sony WH-1000XM6 noise-cancelling headphones for just $398 at Amazon. That's $61.99 off and matches the Black Friday deal.

item.title: Xiaomi Watch 2 Pro : cette montre complète sous Wear OS est désormais à moitié prix
item.description: Dévoilée en 2023, la Xiaomi Watch 2 Pro est la première montre du fabricant à tourner sous Wear OS. Elle a tout d'une montre haut de gamme, et pourtant, elle coûte seulement 134 euros chez Électro Dépôt, au lieu de 269,99 euros.

item.title: The Meta Quest 3 is not only on sale at Amazon, it comes with a free $100 digital credit
item.description: The Meta Quest 3 (512GB) is on sale at Amazon for $407.10, down from the normal price of $499.99. That's a 19% discount and it comes with a free $100 digital credit from Amazon.

item.title: History lessons for better public policy: how to build a cyber secure society
item.description: Exploring strategies and innovations shaping safer, more resilient digital communities worldwide.

item.title: Stack Overflow users don’t trust AI. They’re using it anyway
item.description: Today, I’m talking with Prashanth Chandrasekar, who is the CEO of Stack Overflow. I last had Prashanth on the show in 2022, one month before ChatGPT launched. While the generative AI boom had tons of impact on all sorts of companies, it immediately upended everything about Stack Overflow in an existential way. Stack Overflow, if […]
